TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UpdateCheckInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示通过调用 获得的详细更新信息。

span.span: Represents detailed update information obtained through a call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 ，你可以决定是否根据最新版本的相关信息升级 ClickOnce 应用程序。With , you can decide whether to upgrade your ClickOnce application based on information about the newest version. 将返回一个布尔值，指示是否有新的更新。 will return a Boolean value indicating whether there is a new update at all. 属性提供了新版本的版本号，同时 提供了用户应该安装的最早版本。The property provides the version number of the new version, while provides the earliest version that the user should have installed. 表示用户是否需要最新的可用更新。 expresses whether the latest available update is required of the user. 最后， 表示更新的总大小。Finally, expresses the total size of the update. > [!NOTE] > ``仅当应用程序设置为检查更新时，Visual Studio 才会将元素添加到清单中，因此你必须检查**应用程序是否应**在 "[应用程序更新" 对话框](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8eca8743-8e68-4d04-bfd5-4dc0a9b2934f)的 "**更新位置**" 中检查更新或指定更新 URL。Visual Studio adds the `` element to the manifest only if the application is set to check for updates, so you either have to check **The application should check for updates** or specify an update URL in **Update location** in the [Application Updates Dialog Box](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8eca8743-8e68-4d04-bfd5-4dc0a9b2934f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 来确定是否有新的应用程序更新，并 确定是否要求用户安装更新。The following code example uses to determine if there is a new application update, and to determine whether to ask the user to install the update. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AvailableVersion As Version
public: property Version ^ AvailableVersion { Version ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取尚未安装的最新版本的版本号。

span.span: Gets the version number of the latest uninstalled version.

value.span: 表示最新版本的主内部版本号、次内部版本号和修订号。

span.span: The expressing the major and minor build and revision numbers of the latest version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用 来确定是否要根据更新的严重性来安装更新。You can use to decide whether to install the update based on the severity of the update. 例如，如果仅更改了 或 版本属性，则在 或属性更改之前，应用程序可能不需要更新 。For example, if only the or version properties have changed, your application may not need to update until either the or properties change.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsUpdateRequired As Boolean
public: property bool IsUpdateRequired { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个指示是否必须安装更新的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the update must be installed.

value.span: 如果更新是必需的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the update is required; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将更新部署到 ClickOnce 应用程序时，可以将其标记为必需更新，并向应用程序发出信号，通知应立即升级该应用程序。When you deploy an update to your ClickOnce application, you can mark it as a required update, signaling to your application that it should upgrade immediately. 如果最新版本包含关键更新，或者它与早期版本使用的文件格式或后端数据源不兼容，则需要对应用程序进行标记。You want to mark the application if the latest version contains a critical update, or if it is incompatible with file formats or back-end data sources used by the former version. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 来确定是否要求用户安装更新或在不提示的情况下安装更新。The following code example uses to determine whether to ask the user to install the update, or to install it without prompting. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MinimumRequiredVersion As Version
public: property Version ^ MinimumRequiredVersion { Version ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用户必须在计算机上安装的最低版本。

span.span: Gets the minimum version that the user must have installed on the computer.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示用户必须安装的最低版本。

span.span: A expressing the least version that the user must install.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户执行特殊分配或离开计算机几周或几个月时，应用程序可能会丢失所需的更新。Applications can miss required updates when the user takes on a special assignment or is away from the computer for weeks or months. 使用Use 若要确定用户是否在一段时间内未升级应用程序，并且缺少一个或多个所需更新。 to determine if the user has not upgraded the application in a while, and has missed one or more required updates. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 在有必需的更新可用时向用户显示该属性。The following code example demonstrates displaying the property to the user when there is a required update available. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

exception.span: 没有可供安装的新版本。

span.span: There is no new version available to install.
